title: Disabling mouse wheel scroll zoom?
body:
I have tried various fixes  from Google, but not seem to work... How can I disable the zoom?


Sorry if this has been asked a lot but nothing seems to work. 

Thanks.

replies.body: While we don't have a direct way in the client to disable the mouse wheel scrolling, but you should be able to go into your mouse settings and disable that scroll entirely. That way, the input won't even be picked up by the game.
